pages.disclaimers: Disclaimers - Legal Information for ElegantCreations Website and Services ElegantCreations Home About us Services Contact Disclaimers ElegantCreations strives to provide the most accurate and up-to-date information on this website, but we make no warranties or guarantees, expressed or implied, about the completeness, reliability, suitability, or availability of the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on this website for any purpose. To the fullest extent permissible by applicable law, ElegantCreations disclaims all responsibility for any loss or damage resulting from your use of or reliance on the information provided on this website. This includes, but is not limited to, indirect or consequential loss, or any loss or damage whatsoever arising from loss of data or profits arising out of, or in connection with, the use of this website. Specific Disclaimers: **Product Disclaimer:** The information and descriptions contained on this website regarding our products are for informational purposes only. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or suitability of this information. You should always conduct your own research and due diligence before making any purchasing decisions. **Service Disclaimer:** While we strive to provide excellent service, ElegantCreations cannot guarantee the outcome or specific results of any service offered. The information provided on this website is not a substitute for professional advice, and you should always consult with a qualified professional before making any decisions. Every effort is made to keep the website up and running smoothly. However, ElegantCreations takes no responsibility, and will not be liable, for the website being temporarily unavailable due to technical issues beyond our control. This website may contain links to other websites not owned or controlled by ElegantCreations. We have no control over the nature, content, and availability of those sites. The inclusion of any links does not necessarily imply a recommendation or endorsement by ElegantCreations of the views expressed within them. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Your Privacy Matters to ElegantCreations ElegantCreations Home About us Services Contact Privacy Policy ElegantCreations is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our website. **Information We Collect:** Information you voluntarily provide: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, such as your name, email address, and phone number, when you contact us, place an order, or subscribe to our newsletter. Automatic information: We may also collect certain automatic information about your visit to our website, such as your browser type, IP address, and the pages you visit. **How We Use Your Information:** To fulfill your requests: We may use your personal information to respond to your inquiries, process your orders, and send you important information about your orders. To send you marketing communications: We may use your personal information to send you marketing communications, such as newsletters and promotional offers, unless you opt out of receiving such communications. To improve our website: We may use your information to improve our website and to personalize your experience. **Disclosure of Your Information:** We will not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties outside of our organization, except as necessary to fulfill your requests (e.g., to ship an order) or as required by law. **Your Choices:** You can opt out of receiving marketing communications from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in those communications. **Security:** We take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website or internet transmission is completely secure. **Changes to this Privacy Policy:** We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on our website. ElegantCreations website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline ElegantCreations Legal Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
